brief.brief: The number of entry lines to display for an array field.
The array field you are currently reading has a window definition of 3.

detail.detail: Scrolling enables you to display many lines of information in an array.
The window only defines how many lines will appear on the screen when Service Manager displays the form.
This field must also be set to the number of lines that are to be displayed of a structure/virtual join format.

In other words, if you define a virtual join format to contain three lines of data, the window setting for the input field on the primary format that refers to the virtual join format must be set to 3. If you define a structure format that contains 2 lines, and you want to display 3 sets of the structure on your main format, the window setting for the structure field on the main format is 6.
A window setting of -1 causes all non-null entries of an array to be displayed, moving all data below the window on the format down accordingly.
